A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointment in every possible way. The way Luke was treated\, the plot holes so big a Death Star could pass through them\, weird choices meant only to be a plot driver and nothing else. I was convinced this would be better than The Force Awakens\, but boy was i wrong. I don't even care what happens in Ep. IX anymore. Wasted characters\, stupid choices\, terrible writing. I would rather watch a Jar Jar focused trilogy than anything Rian Johnson ever writes again.
